about_the_game:
《末日》 is a doomsday game developed by Mallet Games, a studio formed by middle school students at Bilibili.
It brings players advanced gameplay, new gun control feel, thrilling zombie battlefield, and innovative gameplay and scenes.
A variety of storyline modes suitable for players around the world are waiting for you.

·exciting Zombie Battlefield Experience

Silent Yet Stimulating

·real Scene Experience

Using Rtx Ray to Chase Players In Person

·a Unique Apocalyptic Plot

Full of technology and fantasy, unrealistic yet reasonable

·a Passionate Development Team

Produced by a game studio composed of Bilibili students
